Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

      • matching

        public static <T> java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> matching(java.util.List<T> list,
                                                             T that)
        Returns a list containing all the elements from list that are equal to that, i.e all elements that satisfy 
        element.equals(that) == true
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of elements
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        that - the element to match
        Returns:
        The list of all matching elements.

      • equalsGeometry

        public static boolean equalsGeometry(com.github.filosganga.geogson.model.Geometry<? extends com.github.filosganga.geogson.model.positions.Positions> g1,
                                     com.github.filosganga.geogson.model.Geometry<? extends com.github.filosganga.geogson.model.positions.Positions> g2)
        Returns true if both Geometries are equivalent. The definition of equivalent depends on the type of geometry.
        Parameters:
        g1 - the first Geometry
        g2 - the second Geometry
        Returns:
        true if both geometries are equal.
